column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=How could there not be ?
#Text=Sometimes it leads to marriage .
#Text=Sometimes it 's just affairs .
#Text=Sometimes it involves just dealing with bar girls in Okinawa or Leone or Sicily or somewhere .
#Text=Sure .
#Text=Not so now .
#Text=This is the first war like that , in Iraq .
#Text=Have you been there ?
#Text=No , I have n't been there .
#Text=I 'd like to go .
#Text=Why have n't you ?
#Text=Well , I have to have somebody that will give me credentials .
#Text=That should n't be too hard for you .
#Text=Sure it is , because you think The New York Times , the Time Magazine , Newsweek Magazine ... . ?
#Text=Esquire ?
#Text=Esquire ?
#Text=Esquire does political reporting .
#Text=It so happens there is someone that 's working on such a thing right now for me .
#Text=I have n't heard from them yet .
#Text=What would be the difficulties for you in achieving that ?
#Text=It seems like you would just have to make a phone call .
#Text=You very much overrate whatever stature you think I have .
#Text=I mean there are people that are there .
#Text=The New York Times has probably fifteen , twenty people there .
#Text=And they 're not going to underwrite me as a freelancer .
#Text=People want staff now .
#Text=Obviously you have to be covered by health and all this ... .
#Text=I think you 're underrating your stature .
#Text=The point is , I 'm not there , okay .
#Text=We can talk all morning about this , but the point is I am now working on something .
#Text=But I 'm trying to get back to what I was saying before , whether or not I 'm there , I 'm now here .
#Text=Will I be there ?
#Text=Maybe .
#Text=But there are stories .
#Text=I mean I 'm quoting myself as to what kind of stories .
#Text=The television shows American troops kicking down doors and I wonder : who fixes the doors ?
#Text=The other day I was on an airplane coming back from Bogotá and I sat next to a guy , an American , who was a Green Beret guy years ago .
#Text=Well now he 's in Baghdad as one of these civilian contractors .
#Text=He has a company and he invited me to go with this company .
#Text=That 's my little thing that I have in the offing .
#Text=But he told me that the worst thing , not kicking down the doors , but they go in there and they open the locks of what we 'll call the hope chests of women who hope to marry .
#Text=The soldiers go in and they just break open the locks of these women 's hope chests or whatever you call them and that is really the ultimate insult .
#Text=It 's like raping the women right there .
#Text=And this stuff goes on all the time .
#Text=Well you could write about that .
#Text=And no one writes about that .
